apis.description: Provide or update an answer to one or more QuizQuestions.

operations.notes: Provide or update an answer to one or more QuizQuestions.

parameters.name: quiz_submission_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: attempt
parameters.description: The attempt number of the quiz submission being taken. Note that this must be the latest attempt index, as questions for earlier attempts can not be modified.

parameters.name: validation_token
parameters.description: The unique validation token you received when the Quiz Submission was created.

parameters.name: access_code
parameters.description: Access code for the Quiz, if any.

parameters.name: quiz_questions
parameters.description: Set of question IDs and the answer value. See {Appendix: Question Answer Formats} for the accepted answer formats for each question type.
